p:
This approach was implemented for the assessment of the synergistic and antagonistic interactions of R. rosea (RR), W. somnifera (WS), E. senticosus (ES), Rhaponticum carthamoides (RC), Bryonia alba (BA), and melatonin (M), with the purpose of predicting the potential pharmacological and toxicological profiles of their combinations (RR–BA, RR–WS, WS–M, RC–ES–WS).
